subTitle: Join the re:edu Team
description: re:edu is a startup and spin-off of the Institute for Geoinformatics at the University of MÃ¼nster and offers solutions for education, research, sustainability, and participation - digital and open - for everyone. We develop, among other things, web-based geoinformation and individual learning management systems, data analysis software and infrastructures, learning or citizen science apps.

item: Flexible working hours and personal responsibilty in the home office
Positive co-design of a topic that is relevant to society
A responsible task with meaning and room for manoeuvre
A great collegial environment, an appreciative and motivated team
